Module no.ntnu.mathijoh.wargame
Package no.ntnu.mathijoh.wargame.models.map

Class BattleMap

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.mathijoh.wargame.models.map.BattleMap
public class BattleMap extends Object
This is a class meant for keeping the different tiles in the game and allowing for units to move and "see" within the map.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mathias J. Kirkeby

      Places a unit on the map. TODO: Implement a better placement system, Now it just places the unit on the first tile. It also takes to long to place with really big maps and armies
      Parameters:
      token - the token to place on the map
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • getPossibleTargets

      public Map<Tile,Unit> getPossibleTargets(Unit unit)
      Finds the closest enemy unit given the unit and the tile the unit should be moved to for attacking it
      Parameters:
      unit - the unit that is attacking
      Returns:
      HashMap where the key is the tile it should move to and the value the closest enemy unit
